title: Project Management - Hardware Procurement
description: A project manager needs to order the new server and firewall required for an upcoming project.

tasks.description: Review the project quote to get the exact make and model of the hardware to be ordered.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM has the correct hardware specifications.

tasks.description: Place the order with the preferred hardware distributor.
Track the order and update the project plan with the estimated delivery date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project plan is updated with the hardware delivery timeline.
